quote: What makes me angry is when people know what is right but have, over the years, attuned themselves to the fact that what they're doing, stealing money from government, is acceptable.
quote_letters: WHAT MAKES ME ANGRY IS WHEN PEOPLE KNOW WHAT IS RIGHT BUT HAVE OVER THE YEARS ATTUNED THEMSELVES TO THE FACT THAT WHAT THEYRE DOING STEALING MONEY FROM GOVERNMENT IS ACCEPTABLE
